name: test_account_negative_scenarios[Ravi Kumar]
description:
Test negative scenarios like Missing Fields.
    Uses 'accounts_api_manager' to authenticate, proving that even valid users
    cannot send invalid data (422 Unprocessable Entity).

parameters.name: row
parameters.value: {'tags': 'regression', 'scenario': 'missing fields', 'account_holder_name': 'Ravi Kumar', 'dob': '1992-11-02', 'gender': '', 'email': 'ravi.kumar@example.com', 'phone': '+91-9876543210', 'address': '12 MG Road, Bengaluru, KA', 'zip_code': '560001', 'account_type': 'Savings', 'balance': '150000.00', 'status': 'Active', 'services': 'Cheque Book,Internet Banking,Debit Card', 'marketing_opt_in': 'true', 'updated_account_holder_name': 'Ravi K.', 'updated_dob': '1992-11-02', 'updated_gender': 'Male', 'updated_email': 'ravi.k@example.com', 'updated_phone': '+91-9876543210', 'updated_address': '22 Brigade Rd, Bengaluru, KA', 'updated_zip_code': '560025', 'updated_account_type': 'Savings', 'updated_balance': '175000.00', 'updated_status': 'Active', 'updated_services': 'Cheque Book,Internet Banking', 'updated_marketing_opt_in': 'false'}
